content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Dec 2018I currently work at an SME, in the tech sector. However I recently was given an offer to jump to an MNC, where I will be managing a team of 45 instead of 12. How do I prepare myself for this?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 Dec 2018just be humble and approachable and i'm sure you'll do fine :)0 comments0

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 04 Dec 2018It's basically 4 times more. study how you handle the 12 now, try to plan the expansion to 45.For time and capacity not enough, time to be creative and work out the ways, trim the unnecessary activites, consolidate some and streamline them. Honestly, it's only when you've tried it then to be able to do it.  Try :) 0 comments0
